main.java.de.bsi.tsesimulator.constants

Class Constants

  • java.lang.Object
    • main.java.de.bsi.tsesimulator.constants.Constants

  • public abstract class Constants
extends java.lang.Object
    Class that provides values that likely will not change in the future for all classes of the TSE simulator. Values that are subject to constant change by the user of the simulator can be configured using a configuration file. Please note, that some of the provided values are default values that are only used as a fallback solution for when the user has provided illegal values in the configuration file.

    Warning: Javadoc may not represent regular expressions appropriately due to tagging issues. Refer to source code for actual regular expressions if necessary!
    Author:
    dpottkaemper

        public static final long ILLEGAL_TRANSACTION_NUMBER

      • ALGORITHM_OID_MAP

        public static final java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> ALGORITHM_OID_MAP
        Maps the algorithm object identifiers according to BSI TR-03151 to the names they have. Example: ECDSA_PLAIN_SHA_256 = 0.4.0.127.0.7.1.1.4.1.3
        OID ECDSA plain sha256 from bsi-de algorithms id-ecc signatures ecdsa-plain-signatures

        Only those algorithms that are applicable to the simulator are mapped. That means, there is no ECDSA_PLAIN_SHA_224, for example.

      • OID_URN_REGEX

        public static final java.lang.String OID_URN_REGEX
        Value: 
        ^(urn:oid:){1}[0-2]{1}(\\.(([1-9]+[0-9]*)|0{1}))*$

        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • OID_ASN1_SIMPLE_DOTS_REGEX

        public static final java.lang.String OID_ASN1_SIMPLE_DOTS_REGEX
        Value: 
        ^[0-2]{1}(\\.(([1-9]+\\d*)|0{1}))*$

        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • OID_ASN1_SIMPLE_SPACES_REGEX

        public static final java.lang.String OID_ASN1_SIMPLE_SPACES_REGEX
        Value: 
        ^\\{{1}( )?[0-2]{1}( (([1-9]+[0-9]*)|0{1}))*( )?\\}{1}$

        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • OID_ASN1_ADVANCED_REGEX

        public static final java.lang.String OID_ASN1_ADVANCED_REGEX
        Value: 
        ^\\{{1}( )?(i|I|j|J){1}(\\w|-){2,14}(\\((0|1|2){1}\\)){1}( (\\w|-)*(\\((([1-9]+[0-9]?)|[0]{1}){1}\\)))*( )?\\}{1}$

        See Also:
        Constant Field Values
